price: Lalu Kami wahyukan kepada Musa, "Pukullah laut itu dengan tongkatmu." Maka terbelahlah lautan itu, dan setiap belahan seperti gunung yang besar.
arabic: فَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضۡرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرۡقٖ كَٱلطَّوۡدِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā ani iḍ'rib biʿaṣāka al-baḥra fa-infalaqa fakāna kullu fir'qin kal-ṭawdi al-ʿaẓīmi
